content.raw:
We often get  the "Commands have been issued to devices attached to X at t= ...s s and ... s. This Pseudoclock cannot support update delays shorter than ... sec." when rewriting experiment scripts. This is mostly caused by shutters that just happen to get to close to some other pulse.
This is hard to debug, as we can't just view the file in runviewer since it didn't compile. 
It would be really helpful to get the names of the colliding outputs as this would make things a lot easier.
content.html: We often get the "Commands have been issued to devices attached to X at t= ...s s and ... s. This Pseudoclock cannot support update delays shorter than ... sec." when rewriting experiment scripts. This is mostly caused by shutters that just happen to get to close to some other pulse. This is hard to debug, as we can't just view the file in runviewer since it didn't compile. It would be really helpful to get the names of the colliding outputs as this would make things a lot easier.
